title: tiered wedding cake
description: Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you’ll need 25cm/10in, 22cm/8½in, 18cm/7in, 15cm/6in and 10cm/4in round cake tins and respective thin cake boards. To assemble the cakes, you’ll need a 30cm/12in cake drum, 16 dowelling rods, three 12cm/4½in thin cake board and three 12cm/4½in polystyrene cake spacers covered in ribbon. All of these are available from specialist cake shops.
ingredients: one quantity Rich moist fruit cake
one quantity Rich moist fruit cake
one quantity Rich moist fruit cake
ribbons, fresh flowers or fondant flowers, to decorate
